From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Cliffjumper looks around nervously. "I'm not sure. Beachcomber, as a
geologist, what do you think." 

Beachcomber walked to the edge of the hill, and held out his hands. The
palms slid open, and little radars emerged from both, and began to spin.
"Hmmmmmmmmm, since we are a small group, I think we will need a large
area, to lose enemies in. Also, since most of us seem maneuverable, we
should have rough terrain, like maybe a mountain." He suggested.
